thread.title: These balloons could take you to the edge of space
thread.title_full: These balloons could take you to the edge of space

title: These balloons could take you to the edge of space
text:
These balloons could take you to the edge of space by Maya Dangerfield @CNNTech Space exploration company World View is developing balloons designed to carry people to space. CNN correspondent Rachel Crane chats with astronaut Mark Kelly about the plans. Related Videos Alan Colmes, Fox News contributor and longtime broadcaster, dies at 66
